About.title: What's Mahjong Stars?
About.description: Explore Mahjong Stars, a Web3 platform where ancient Mahjong meets modern play. Challenge others, collect unique NFT characters, and earn rewards in a dynamic online world. Connect globally through the power of blockchain for a revolutionary gaming experience.

title.2: Don’t panic. The game is almost here

Bubbles.description:
Subscribe and maybe,
just maybe, we'll let you in on it first.
Bubbles.agreeTerms: By clicking 'Subscribe', you agree to our <terms>Terms & Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

1.4: Oh snap. Did I just rob you of all your Star Points? xoxo
1.6: IYKYK. And if you don't know, subscribe. I don't have all day.
1.7: Mamma mia… they're gonna simp for me aren't they?
1.8: Mercury is in retrograde and squared with Saturn. Don't feel bad for playing terribly, it was hopeless.
1.10: This leather jacket is giving wealthy divorcé energy and I'm here for it.
1.11: This sweater guy gives off zero rizz energy #sorrynotsorry
1.12: They say happy in games unhappy in love. I'm sorry to tell you I've only had terrible boyfriends.
1.13: It's like… total unity… this is everything.
1.14: Whoopsie. Did I just break your heart?
1.16: Actually "don't be square" is a derogatory term and I think we should be mindful of our words.
1.17: Say less, I've seen enough. I think I'm in love.
1.18: This is hotter than the current geopolitical climate. No cap.
1.19: AI this, AI that. Whatever happened to cute manipulative girlfriends?
1.20: If only you could see what my beautiful digital peepers can…
1._tone: Stylish, flirty, curious. She’s seeing secret things on her phone and reacting with hype but no details

2.1: It's called Bang Bang Mahjong. I swear it's real!
2.2: Granny's in this game. I'm already scared
2.3: They said you can unlock special moves!?!
2.4: You can play against AI too… they're fast
2.5: Is it weird I want to buy a digital slipper?
2.6: Dude… I think the shop has tables??
2.7: I saw the points system. It's kinda genius
2.8: There's a character called Jenny… she's cold
2.9: I think you can win stuff that actually matters…
2.10: Wait… are NFTs really in this?!
2._tone: Don’t panic. The game’s almost here

3.1: Fast hands win. Yours are shaking
3.2: Bang Bang Mahjong. You'll bang your head trying to keep up
3.3: No luck here. Just skill. Which you don't have
3.4: Don't just match. Think. If you can
3.5: Speed matters. But not if you're stupid
3.6: You can buy effects, but not talent
3.7: Skins are cute. Wins are better
3.8: Spend on a table if it helps you focus. You'll need it
3.9: Special moves are fun. Unless I'm using mine on you
3.10: Points, perks, upgrades. All wasted if you don't play smart
3.11: Yes, you can play bots. They play better than most of you
3.12: Earn points. Trade for NFTs. But don't get greedy
3.13: Sell your tile set if you want. You'll still lose to me
3.14: Real value, digital pain. Welcome to Mahjong Stars

tonyKong.quote: I don't chase luck. I create it.
tonyKong.name: Tony Kong
tonyKong.description: Believing himself the undisputed Master of Mahjong, Tony knows exactly how to turn a bad hand into a winning game. Challenge him if you dare!

anneWan.quote: Style on the streets, strategy at the table. Watch me win both.
anneWan.name: Anne Wan
anneWan.description: Anne Wan is bold, playful, and always on-trend. She brings a fresh, fearless energy to the Mahjong world — balancing smart moves with a love for bubble tea, sneakers, and all things stylish. Anne doesn't just play to win — she plays to express herself.

mrsChen.quote: I've forgotten more winning hands than you've ever played.
mrsChen.name: Mrs Chen
mrsChen.description: Mrs. Chen is a no-nonsense Mahjong veteran who's been crushing tables since before you were born. Fiercely strategic and a little terrifying, she commands respect with just a look — and her grumpy cat is just as judgmental. Underestimate her at your own risk.

uncleCai.quote: While you're counting tiles, I'm counting my wins.
uncleCai.name: Uncle Cai
uncleCai.description: Uncle Cai is a streetwise Mahjong master who's seen it all — and usually wins it all. Laid-back with a sharp mind, he prefers to fan himself and let others sweat. His old-school swag, gold chain, and deadpan humor make him a legend both at the table and on the streets.

ContactForm.title: Contact Us
ContactForm.description: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: I would love to learn more about your mahjong game and how I can get involved!

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon.

error.title: Something went wrong. Please try again.

name.minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.

subject.minLength: Subject must be at least 5 characters.

message.minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters.
message.maxLength: Message must be less than 1000 characters.

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.description: Find answers to common inquiries about our Web3 Mahjong Game:

0.question: What is Mahjong Stars?
0.answer: Mahjong Stars is a Web3-enabled, AI-powered multiplayer mahjong platform that allows players to play, train AI avatars, and compete in global tournaments, both live and autonomously.

1.question: What makes Mahjong Stars unique?
1.answer: AI avatars that learn your playstyle, 24/7 gameplay via AI bots, NFT and crypto integration, built-in social gaming mechanics, and multi-platform access through a Unity-based app.

2.question: What is the role of AI in the game?
2.answer: AI avatars replicate your unique playstyle, allowing you to compete even when offline. You can train your AI to improve its strategy, creating a personalised gaming assistant.

3.question: What are StarsPoints and how do they work?
3.answer:
StarsPoints are the in-game currency:
- Purchasable via fiat or crypto
- Used for game access, AI bots, items, and fees
- Have no value outside the platform
- Drive revenue through gameplay usage

4.question: How does Mahjong Stars generate revenue?
4.answer: Revenue is generated from entry fees, premium AI services, in-game item sales, and NFT transaction fees.

5.question: What is $MJS in this context?
5.answer: $MJS is the platform’s utility token, used to buy in-game items, trade NFTs, stake for revenue share and rewards, and support the game economy.

6.question: Is there an NFT component?
6.answer: Yes. Players can unlock, trade, and rent NFTs. Withdrawal NFTs allow converting in-game earnings to real-world value through third-party platforms.

7.question: How big is the potential market?
7.answer: Over 600 million global mahjong players. The Web3 gaming sector is projected to surpass $30B in 2025, offering massive opportunity.

8.question: Who is behind the project?
8.answer: The team includes experts from Mahjong Logic, PokerStars Asia, and Coinbase Asia, with deep experience in gaming and Web3.

9.question: What’s the roadmap for 2025?
9.answer:
Q1: Beta build release
Q2: Fundraising and partnerships
Q3: V2 launch and NFT marketplace
Q4: $MJS token launch and exchange listings

stayInGame.title: Stay in the Game Stay on Top
stayInGame.description: Play anytime. Climb the leaderboard and grow your skill.

trainableAI.title: Trainable AI That Plays Your Way
trainableAI.description: Customize an AI to learn and adapt to your playing style.

collectCharacters.title: Collect the Unforgettable
collectCharacters.description: Unlock rare characters and exclusive items with your blockchain.

bringFriends.title: Bring Your Friends to the Table
bringFriends.description: Challenge friends, share laughs, and battle through rich matches.

shenzhen.title: Shenzhen Mahjong Rules, aka Hong Kong
shenzhen.description: Experience the fast-paced excitement of this Mahjong variant where you strategically preserve your Kongs.

riichi.title: Riichi Mahjong Rules
riichi.description: The thrilling Japanese Mahjong variant. Coming later 2025.

Hero.title: Join the Web3 Mahjong Game
Hero.subtitle: Challenge Your Friends at Mahjong Stars Where Cool Characters Rule the Game!

Newsletter.title: Never miss an update!
Newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest announcements, news and exclusive offers.
